author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Steinhoff Says Commences Waiver Process Regarding Certain Convertible Bonds
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Steinhoff International Holdings NV :
* COMMENCEMENT OF WAIVER PROCESS - PROPOSALS REGARDING CERTAIN CONVERTIBLE BONDS
* ‍BEGUN PROCESS BY SEEKING WAIVERS OF EUR 465 MILLION CONVERTIBLE BONDS DUE 2021, EUR 1,116 MILLION BONDS DUE 2022 AND EUR 1,100 MILLION BONDS DUE 2023​
* ‍WAIVERS BEING SOUGHT FROM HOLDERS OF BONDS RELATE TO FAILURE BY ISSUER TO DELIVER CERTIFICATES OF COMPLIANCE IN LIGHT OF ACCOUNTING IRREGULARITIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
